column2: "I-I can't, no more... Any more training and I'll d-die..."
"Well hello, my dear! Impeccable timing! Step this way!"
"Katori. Your training is far from over."
"Now, now Sir Saga! This is hardly the time or place!"
"<%me> here was just asking to learn more about your Jet Boots!!"
"...At this very moment? How terribly convenient..."
"...Very well. To turn down such a request is against our duty. Allow me to explain."
"Its primary characteristic is that as Techniques are charged, it both changes element and boosts damage."
"...In short, Jet Boots are in fact Tech weapons. They rely on Techniques to function."
"Thus, one would expect these to be better suited for a Newman like Katori instead of a Cast such as myself. However..."
"It's one thing to have to wear such revealing attire, but then to brandish my legs in such a manner, how disgraceful! Eep!"
"...Katori's immaturity knows no bounds, and so I am forced to assume the role."
"Why thank you for your honest opinion!!"
"I suppose that's sufficient explanation. I fulfilled my duty. Katori, back to training."
"Is that so? Not to worry, a bit of exercise will improve your condition."
"Have you not a shred of sympathy!?"
